original_text: My special people of Israel, I will make you strong again. You will be so happy that you dance, as people make music with tambourines. My special people of Israel,
korean_text: 처녀 이스라엘아 내가 다시 너를 세우리니 네가 세움을 입을 것이요 네가 다시 소고를 들고 즐거워하는 자들과 함께 춤추며 나오리라

sentences.original_text: I will make you strong again
You will be so happy that you dance
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 춤추게 될 만큼 너무 기뻐하리라

sentences.original_text: as people make music with tambourines
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 작은 북으로 음악을 만드는 것처럼
